definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to give as a present/to repel/to bestow an honorary title after death (old)

sentences.english: Before I escape, I gave the allowance my mother gave me to the old lady.
sentences.chinese: 逃離之時，我把媽媽早上給的零花錢轉贈給老人家。

definition: to pass (sth) on (to sb else)/to transfer sb (to another hospital etc)
to read and pass on/to pass on for perusal

to visit (a patient, prisoner etc)/to look inquiringly
Chiang Wei-kuo (1916-1997), adopted son of Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
to disappear without trace/to vanish all of a sudden/to spread fast/to spread like wildfire
to make a profit/to gain/to get an advantage
